column5: Saw the pic and it was too good to pass up
ha ha thats too funny !!!!   thanks for the morning laugh....cheers
That's gotta be the Salmon, lol.
Is that what I have to look forward too learning this river fishing thing?
Hey if you're shoulder to shoulder there won't be enough room to fall down. ;-)
Not quite......more like the dominoe effect!
I think you're talking about the elite fly fishing crowd, not us steelheaders
Opening morning, give them an hour, they'll be gone.
I have a solution for that Rob, I was thinking of putting training wheels on my waders!
Hey ... isnt that the Grand Cascapedia ???

That must be a joke lol.Who in there right mind would fish in those conditions? That's why steelhead fishing is better.Later into the fall/winter,temps to cold,nasty weather,rain,maybe snow.What else could a fellow ask for when river fishing?.Good fishing everyone.
Looks like combat fishing to me. And look at buddy boging the big bomb haha.
There's a reason I fish from my boat out in the middle of the lake
Give me a fly rod...I'll clear some space pretty quickly lol!
Burt is like a 30x30 pool of death, lol!!!!
